Title: Requires a valid government issued photo identification card to be presented when casting a ballot
Summary: Requires a New York state driver's license or non-driver ID, a United States passport, an identification card issued by a United States educational institution, a United States military identification card, a government issued medical card, or any identification card issued by the United States or the state of New York to be presented when casting a ballot.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring a valid government issued photo identification card to be presented when casting a ballot
